Function Documentation

template<class T>
void ThreadSynch::details::throwHooked ( const T &  orig,
boost::function< void()> &  onDeathFunctor 
)

A function which throws an exception object with an attached on-cleanup functor.

Parameters:
[in] orig the exception object to be thrown.
[in] onDeathFunctor a functor, with return type void and no parameters, which will be executed when the exception object is destroyed.
Remarks:
The function will create a dummy class which wraps the exception object to be thrown. When the exception object is free'd, which is usually when the catch block is completed, the functor will be executed.
